name: Yakima Valley Hops
base_tip: High perishability; prioritize cold-chain integrity and pre-book EU freight capacity.

name: Yakima Valley Wine (Bulk Export)
base_tip: Focus on high-volume logistics and utilize flexitanks to minimize per-liter transport friction.

name: Yakima Valley Wine (Bottled / Premium)
base_tip: Target premium EU distributors and ensure labeling compliance, bottle protection, and insurance coverage.
